title: Lakshmi Devi Pendant - Traditional Devasena Bottu
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the divine Lakshmi Devi seated on a lotus, meticulously handcrafted using traditional nakshi work techniques. The deity is surrounded by intricate floral and foliage designs, studded with dazzling diamonds. Accents of Burmese rubies and Zambian emeralds add to the pendant's rich color and allure. The pendant is finished with a string of lustrous South Sea pearls for added elegance.
occasions: Suitable for auspicious occasions like weddings (muhurtham)
or as a treasured heirloom piece. Can also be worn as a statement piece for special events.
description: This Devasena Bottu pendant embodies traditional South Indian artistry and symbolism. The handcrafted nakshi work and the presence of Lakshmi Devi, the goddess of wealth and prosperity, make it a deeply meaningful piece. The use of high-quality gold, diamonds, rubies, emeralds, and South Sea pearls ensures lasting beauty and value. Its intricate design and impeccable craftsmanship make it a unique collector's item.
